price: Allah O’dur. O’ndan başka (hak) ilah yoktur. Dünyada da ahirette de hamd O’nadır. Hüküm de O’nundur. Ve O’na döndürüleceksiniz.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-ḥamdu fī al-ūlā wal-ākhirati walahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
